definition: to touch/to make contact with sth/to stir up sb's emotions
to feel with the hand/to touch/to stroke/to grope/to steal/to abstract
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: A part of the touchpad buttons are already on the beveled edge.
sentences.chinese: 觸摸板按鍵的部分已在斜邊。

sentences.english: For instance, if you want to see your heart rate, just tap the bezel.
sentences.chinese: 例如，如果你想看你的心率，只要輕怕觸摸板。

sentences.english: That is, the positions of the fingers need to be in the corners.
sentences.chinese: 也就是說，手指必須位於觸摸板的角落位置。

sentences.english: Or modify the pre-set programming to fit your needs-right from the touch pad.
sentences.chinese: 或修改預先設定的方案，滿足您的需要，從觸摸板。

sentences.english: The touchpads on both also feature multitouch gestures.
sentences.chinese: 兩款電腦的觸摸板也都有多點觸控功能。
